title: A Pretty Fixation
description: Jordyn DavisI experienced a lot of pain as a child.It was so hard to face that I repressed it all.The last thing I need is my college’s soccer star pursuing me to fulfill a fantasy.Caleb insists we met years ago.I tell him he’s mistaken.Yet the more he chases me, I start to realize I had suppressed the boy with sandy blonde hair and piercing gray eyes among the horrible memories.But as the walls unravel, it becomes clear that we both remember things differently.Caleb RosmondI do know you, Jordyn.My little dove.I’ve searched for you all these years, and I won’t back down until you give in to me. Until your skin burns at my touch, and you crave me as much as I want you.I know you’re the girl who stole my heart as a kid, and I have every intention of taking yours now.*WARNING: Mature language and scenes, and the mention of abuse may be triggering to some.
author: Symone West
